description: This file defines a LightningJS component named 'Home', which includes imported components, a template with UI elements, state variables, lifecycle hooks, and methods for animations and transitions. It represents the main page layout with logo, loader, text, and button.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing the Home page with animated elements and interactions.

methods.name: rotateColors
methods.description: Method to rotate the loader's color through a predefined array of colors at specified intervals.
